Visit Our New Showroom

All Your Favorite Products In One Place

We invite you to visit our beautiful 3,000 square foot showroom conveniently located in the middle of Ketchikan. Our highly customizable products demonstrate true quality and character that is suitable for all styles and trends. Products are being added to our website weekly, along with new samples arriving to our showroom for you experience personally.

Whether it’s new construction, remodeling, or you’re the do-it-yourselfer; you’ll always find the right product and the best prices at Interiors by Island Tile.
